final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph Applicant
        A1[Loan application]
        A2[Loan application]
        A3[Loan application]
        A4[Loan application]
    end

    subgraph Loan_Officer
        B1[Loan application received]
        B2[Receive updated application]
        B3[Return application back to applicant]
        B4[Check application form completeness]
        B5[Assess eligibility]
        B6[Reject application]
        B7[Prepare acceptance pack]
        B8[Check if home insurance quote is requested]
        B9[Send acceptance pack]
        B10[Verify repayment agreement]
        B11[Cancel application]
        B12[Approve application]
        B13[Notify cancelation]
        B14[Notify approval]
        B15[Agreement summary]
    end

    subgraph Loan_Provider
        C1[Loan application]
    end

    subgraph Financial_Officer
        D1[Check credit history]
        D2[Credit history report]
        D3[Assess loan risk]
        D4[Risk assessment]
        D5[Risk rules DB]
    end

    subgraph Property_Appraiser
        E1[Appraise property]
    end

    subgraph Insurance_Sales_Rep
        F1[Send home insurance quote]
    end

    A1 --> B1
    B1 --> B4
    B4 -->|form incomplete| B3
    B4 -->|form complete| B5
    B3 --> B2
    B2 --> B4
    B5 -->|applicant not eligible| B6
    B5 -->|applicant eligible| B7
    B6 --> B14[Loan application rejected]
    B7 --> B8
    B8 -->|quote requested| F1
    B8 -->|always| B9
    F1 --> B9
    B9 --> B10
    B10 -->|applicant disagrees| B11
    B10 -->|applicant agrees| B12
    B11 --> B13
    B13 --> B14[Loan application canceled]
    B12 --> B14[Loan application approved]

    B4 --> C1
    C1 --> D1
    D1 --> D2
    D2 --> D3
    D3 -->|+| E1
    D3 -->|+| D5
    D5 --> D4
    E1 --> D4
    D4 --> B5

    B10 -->|2 weeks| B11
    B12 --> B15
    B15 --> B11
    B15 --> B13
    B15 --> B14
